title: T10 Robot Vacuum & Mop
description:
Through the T10 Robot Vacuum & Mop APP, users can remotely control and unlock advanced functions for the robot.
Remote Control
Check the robot status at anytime from anywhere; remotely control robot to begin task; view robot cleaning path and cleaning information in real time.
Planned Cleaning
Users can choose which rooms to clean, number of cleaning times, mop moisture level and other options; design exclusive cleaning plans for different scenarios.
No-go Zones Management
Users can set no-go zones in APP for both vacuuming and mopping; the robot will automatically avoid these areas when cleaning.

Users can choose which rooms to clean, number of cleaning times, mop moisture level and other options; design exclusive cleaning plans for different scenarios.
No-go Zones Management
Users can set no-go zones in APP for both vacuuming and mopping; the robot will automatically avoid these areas when cleaning.
